current_offers.short_description: Join on a combined cover before August 31 and get 1 month free
current_offers.terms:
Only available to new members.

This offer is made and executed by Frank Health Insurance.

current_offers.short_description: Join HBF on combined cover or extras only and HBF will waive all 2 month waiting periods
current_offers.terms:
Available on combined covers and on extras only.

This offer is made and executed by HBF.

current_offers.short_description: Join Peoplecare on hospital cover or combined cover and Peoplecare will give you a $100 gift card
current_offers.terms:
• This offer is for new members only who purchase a hospital only or hospital and extras cover.
  • Members who purchase Extras or Ambulance only covers are not eligible for the Gift Card.
  • This offer is current as at 1 September 2016, and can be altered or withdrawn at any time. Peoplecare reserves the right to change the offer conditions at any time without notice.
  • This offer is applied to purchases by new members either through the Peoplecare website/call centre or Members Own Health Funds. It is not available through any other intermediary.
  • This offer is not available with any other promotional offers being run by Peoplecare at the same time.
  • All Gift Cards will be delivered by post to the address nominated by the member. Peoplecare are not liable for any damaged, undelivered, lost or stolen Gift Cards and no replacement gift cards will be provided in the event of damage to, non-delivery of, or theft of a Gift Card. Allow 8-9 weeks after the purchase date of the new policy for delivery of the Gift Card.
  • Gift cards are subject to the terms and conditions of the gift card issuer. These conditions can be viewed at https://rewardscometrue.com.au/.
  • This offer is made and executed by Peoplecare.

current_offers.short_description: Get 6 weeks free on combined covers
current_offers.terms:
New member offer – Six weeks free

  1. Offer commences 12.00am, Monday 8 May 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), Friday 30 June 2017, and may be extended.
  2. This offer is only available to new members who satisfy the eligibility criteria of Teachers Health, whose membership application is received by Teachers Health from 8 May 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), 30 June 2017.
  3. The new member must select Hospital and Extras cover, or a combined cover, in order to be eligible to receive this offer.
  4. The new member must provide the promotion code "SIX" when joining online, over the phone or with a Business Development officer.
  5. The new member must select a Direct Debit payment plan.
  6. Six (6) weeks free cover is applied to the second month of the new membership, upon successful receipt of the new member’s first contribution payment.
  7. The offer does not apply to stand-alone Hospital, Extras or Ambulance only policies.
  8. The offer does not apply to policy upgrades, or when a spouse or dependant is added to an existing Teachers Health policy.
  9. This offer is only available to a new Teachers Health policyholder who has not been a paying/financial member of Teachers Health or UniHealth in the past four (4) months.
  10. The offer is not available to new members who have received an incentive offer from Teachers Health or UniHealth within the last 12 months.
  11. Terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.

This offer is made and executed Teachers Health.

If you have further questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact Teachers Health.

current_offers.short_description: Get 1 month free cover on any level of cover
current_offers.terms:
• Offer available for applications received between 12 June and 31 August 2017
  • Eligibility criteria apply.
  • For new members/memberships only.
  • Waiting periods may apply.
  • Only available via direct debit.
  • Not available in conjunction with any other offer.

This offer is made and executed by TUH.

current_offers.short_description: Get 6 weeks free on combined covers
current_offers.terms:
New member offer – Six weeks free

  1. Offer commences 12.00am, Monday 8 May 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), Friday 30 June 2017, and may be extended.
  2. This offer is only available to new members who satisfy the eligibility criteria of UniHealth, whose membership application is received by UniHealth from 8 May 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), 30 June 2017.
  3. The new member must select Hospital and Extras cover, or a combined cover, in order to be eligible to receive this offer.
  4. The new member must provide the promotion code "SIX" when joining online, over the phone or with a Business Development officer.
  5. The new member must select a Direct Debit payment plan.
  6. Six (6) weeks free cover is applied to the second month of the new membership, upon successful receipt of the new member’s first contribution payment.
  7. The offer does not apply to stand-alone Hospital, Extras or Ambulance only policies.
  8. The offer does not apply to policy upgrades, or when a spouse or dependant is added to an existing UniHealth policy.
  9. This offer is only available to a new UniHealth policyholder who has not been a paying/financial member of Uni Health or UniHealth in the past four (4) months.
  10. The offer is not available to new members who have received an incentive offer from Teachers Health or UniHealth within the last 12 months.
  11. Terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.

These offers are made and executed UniHealth.

If you have further questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact UniHealth.

• Available only for new members
  • Gift card will be sent out after policy have been financial for 30 days

This offer is made and executed by Health Partners.
